meanings.definition: A group of artists who specialize in fresco painting.
meanings.sent1: The frescoists gathered in the town square to showcase their latest works.
meanings.sent2: Many famous frescoists from around the world attended the art exhibition.
meanings.sent3: The frescoists decided to paint the entire town square, turning it into a colorful masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her brushstrokes danced on the walls like the skilled hands of a frescoist.
meanings.sent5: The frescoists' paintings brought life to the ancient walls, telling stories of the past.

meanings.definition: The practice or technique of creating frescoes.
meanings.sent1: Learning the art of frescoists requires patience and precision.
meanings.sent2: The delicate process of frescoists involves applying paint to wet plaster.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy apprentice tried to mimic the frescoists but ended up with a messy wall.
meanings.sent4: Her mastery of the frescoists' technique was evident in every stroke she made.
meanings.sent5: The ancient technique of frescoists has been passed down through generations.

meanings.definition: The style or movement associated with fresco painting.
meanings.sent1: The art gallery featured a collection of paintings in the frescoists' style.
meanings.sent2: Art enthusiasts admired the unique characteristics of the frescoists' movement.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer drew inspiration from the colors used by the frescoists.
meanings.sent4: His music resonated with the same harmony found in the frescoists' style.
meanings.sent5: The city walls were adorned with murals reflecting the essence of the frescoists' movement.
